speaker: OCTAVIUS CAESAR
text_entry: SCENE IX. Another part of the plain.

speaker: OCTAVIUS CAESAR
text_entry: Enter MARK ANTONY and DOMITIUS ENOBARBUS

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: Set we our squadrons on yond side o' the hill,

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: In eye of Caesar's battle; from which place

speaker: MARK ANTONY
text_entry: We may the number of the ships behold,
